reg_pit.title:
National Instrument 94-102
Derivatives: Customer Clearing and Protection
of Customer Collateral and Positions

change.changenote: Section 43 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 177/2022, effective July 26, 2022.

bcl:section.bcl:text: A regulated clearing agency that receives customer collateral must electronically deliver to the regulator or securities regulatory authority, within 10 business days of the end of each calendar month, a completed Form 94-102F3 Customer Collateral Report: Regulated Clearing Agency.

change.changenote: Form 94-102F3 footnote 3 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 177/2022, effective July 26, 2022.
change.bcl:indent1: 3 The Reporting Period is the calendar month for which the form is submitted.
